"Uh huh... AH!" Whatever the drunk was going to say to Crossfire was cut short as Arty's blasts hit him in the back, almost slamming him into the wall. He spins around, his back dented, growling. Running toward Arty, the drunk fires two missiles at him.

"How much firepower can to take?" he asks the shield while charging at Arty.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Arty had just gotten free when another slab was flopped on top of him. His
> servos were damaged so he couldn't find the leverage he needed to push it
> back off. He tried to aim his cannons knowing that he was as good as trapped
> but couldn't get an angle to aim at Pacifix. His eyes saw the drunk, his
> cannons turned and aimed, the tip started to glow and Arty fired both
> barrels at full power at the drunks back.
